nodes.documentation:
@title Difficulty oracle contract - Oracle to retrieve the difficulty of the blockchain at given block
 @author Anton Shtylman - <anton@gnosis.pm>
nodes.name: DifficultyOracle

nodes.documentation:
@dev Contract constructor validates and sets target block number
 @param _blockNumber Target block number
@dev Sets difficulty result for the specified upon construction block
nodes.name: setOutcome

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns if difficulty is set
 @return Is outcome set?
nodes.name: isOutcomeSet

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The outcome has not yet been resolved"

arguments.value: The outcome has not yet been resolved

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The outcome has not yet been resolved"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Pushes the outcome to a spericiic OracleConsumer
 @return Outcome
nodes.name: pushOutcome
